types:type.name: covid
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type covid = {| empID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empName: String, empAddress: {| houseNumber: String, streetName: String, city: String, country: String |}, empJoinDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empID\\\":898909,\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Mark\\\",\\\"empAddress\\\":{\\\"houseNumber\\\":\\\"2-1-8987-1\\\",\\\"streetName\\\":\\\"Central Avenue\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"New York\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"USA\\\"},\\\"empJoinDate\\\":\\\"2020-06-08 08:43:12\\\"}"}

types:type.name: covid-payload
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type covid_payload = {| source: String, casetype: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, email: String, dateOfBirth: String, nationalID: String, nationalIDType: String, address: {| street: String, city: String, state: String, postal: String, country: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"source\\\":\\\"hospital1\\\",\\\"casetype\\\":\\\"positive\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"John\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Nixon\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"john@gmail.com\\\",\\\"dateOfBirth\\\":\\\"1989-04-26\\\",\\\"nationalID\\\":\\\"209-49-6193\\\",\\\"nationalIDType\\\":\\\"SSN\\\",\\\"address\\\":{\\\"street\\\":\\\"1600 West Mall St Blvd\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Washington\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"DC\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"20500\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"USA\\\"}}"}
